abstract: Morgan Stanley and Guggenheim Partners were brought in after the online video service received a bid from an unidentified suitor.
snippet: Morgan Stanley and Guggenheim Partners were brought in after the online video service received a bid from an unidentified suitor.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Harrer/Bloomberg News Alan D. Schwartz, the chairman of Guggenheim Partners, addressed the the Bloomberg Link Dealmakers Summit in New York in September 2010.

headline.main: Hulu Hires Advisers for Potential Sale

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
